message: Henry Ford made a car made of hemp that also ran on hemp at the turn of the century. His suppliers didn't like that at all. Neither did the newspaper men of the time, Hurst had a large investment in forestry, so he used his newspapers to brand hemp as a drug used by Hispanics that turned them insane. Of course people bought it up and were here now, after a long unquestioned period of prohibition.
